about_the_game:
Play through the game with the original sprite set.*
Once this DLC has been installed, your game will automatically use them. To switch to the new sprite set, please uninstall this DLC.

* The original sprite set is not animated and may not include 1-to-1 variations (expressions, outfits) for each scene.
detailed_description:
Play through the game with the original sprite set.*
Once this DLC has been installed, your game will automatically use them. To switch to the new sprite set, please uninstall this DLC.

* The original sprite set is not animated and may not include 1-to-1 variations (expressions, outfits) for each scene.

fullgame.name: Signed and Sealed With a Kiss

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: 1.66 Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920x1080px
  • Storage: 45 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X version Leopard 10.6
  • Processor: 1.66 Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920x1080px
  • Storage: 45 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

name: Signed and Sealed With a Kiss - Classic Sprites
